Detailed Description

This class handles loading and caching information on enviromental effects.

Member Function Documentation

def enveffectmanager.EnvEffectManager.loadEnvEffect (   self,
  name 
)

Load the code for a single environmental effect, and instantiate the class for it.

Then store it in the envMap cache.
